614820.name: Fantasy Grounds - Darkwoulfe's Volume 30 - Giants of Ice and Stone (Token Pack)
614820.description:
Darkwoulfes Token Pack Volume 30 - Giants of Ice and Stone

This token pack consist of 29 uniquely designed, 3D rendered VTT tokens, depicting various Giants (Formorian Rock Slinger, and Club wielder, Frost Giant Jarl, Guardsman, Scout, Swordsman, Berserker, Stone Giant War Chief, Librarian, Boulder throwers, Clubsman and Swordsman, and Winter Worgs). These tokens are suitable for use with any fantasy roleplaying game and are optimized for virtual table top (VTT) play. Darkwoulfe's token packs help you fill your game session with character!
This Token Pack includes:
  • 2 Formorians
  • Frost Giant Bersker
  • 3 Frost Giant Guards
  • Frost Giant Jarl
  • Frost Giant Scout
  • 8 Frost Giants with various weapons
  • 3 Librarians
  • All Librarians in one token
  • Stone Giant War Chief
  • 6 Stone Giant with various weapons
  • 2 Winter Wargs
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
